Collaborate With Us

With the aim of reaching as many people as possible, we always lack enthusiastic volunteers. Please contact to collaborate with us.

“Great things in business are never done by one person; they’re done by a team of people”

-STEVE JOBS

Wiser World Internship Programme

WW offers internships for scholars and students from diverse backgrounds, proficient in English, to work under various WW programmes and initiatives. Interns may be assigned administrative, editorial, research, writing or organisational tasks to support the programme or initiative to which they have been assigned.

Research Intern: Herein, you’ll be writing a weekly research brief & analysis on the topics of your academic areas of interest. Reaching out to the experts in the domain and quoting them in your researches.

Timing: Flexible

Please send your CV along with the cover letter to the HR Team – wiserworld@outlook.in

*We are currently not taking any applications.
